name: Mine Upgrade
description:
Explore a cave and mine its valuable rocks and minerals to upgrade your equipment. Hunt for gems and collectables and sell them for coins. Earn rewards and trophies by completing achievements.

Features

  • 15 Rock Types
  • 16 Character Types
  • 72 Upgrades
  • 12 Collectables
  • 46 Achievements
  • Trophies
  • Statistics for competitive play
  • Game filters and effects
